attributes.action: make dog skateboarding a national sport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Skateboarding_dog
"Some dogs can ride a skateboard, although dog skateboarding is not an official dog sport."

If we can support that 'crufts' crap then surely this is worth looking into.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
